name: Richmor Aviation, Inc.
about: Richmor Aviation, Inc. is the largest flight school in the Northeast, operating from three locations in New York's Hudson Valley: Kingston-Ulster Airport, Columbia County Airport, and Schenectady County Airport. As an FAA Certified 141 flight school with Examining Authority, we offer comprehensive training programs from private pilot to commercial pilot and certified flight instructor certifications. Our rigorous training standards and high student graduation rates have earned us FAA distinction for over a decade. We are authorized to enroll international students through TSA and SEVIS. Richmor Aviation is committed to helping students achieve their aviation goals with exceptional training and support. Visit us at www.richmorflightschool.com for more information.
